text: @WhiteHouse How stupid do you think we are , Trump has held back response to this Coronavirus. He still won’t allow the experts to look after things, he has Pence in charge with all Scientists and doctors held back. Now after it is started to worsen he appts Pence as lead, no one else moves

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
